verses.verse: וּכְכַלּ֣וֹת <S%H3615><s%> Now when all this was finished כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all זֹ֗את <S%H2063><s%> likewise יָצְא֨וּ <S%H3318><s%> went out כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <S%H3478><s%> all Israel הַֽנִּמְצְאִים֮ <S%H4672><s%> that were present לְעָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> to the cities יְהוּדָה֒ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וַיְשַׁבְּר֣וּ <S%H7665><s%> in pieces הַמַּצֵּב֣וֹת <S%H4676><s%> the images וַיְגַדְּע֣וּ <S%H1438><s%> and cut down הָאֲשֵׁרִ֡ים <S%H842><s%> the groves וַיְנַתְּצ֣וּ <S%H5422><s%> and threw down אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַ֠בָּמוֹת <S%H1116><s%> the high places וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽמִּזְבְּחֹ֞ת <S%H4196><s%> and the altars מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְהוּדָ֧ה <S%H3063><s%> out of all Judah וּבִנְיָמִ֛ן <S%H1144><s%> and Benjamin וּבְאֶפְרַ֥יִם <S%H669><s%> in Ephraim וּמְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H4519><s%> also and Manasseh עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until לְכַלֵּ֑ה <S%H3615><s%> until they had utterly destroyed וַיָּשׁ֜וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> returned כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּנֵ֧י <S%H1121><s%> them all Then all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man לַאֲחֻזָּת֖וֹ <S%H272><s%> to his possession לְעָרֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5892><s%> into their own cities ס

וַיַּעֲמֵ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> appointed יְחִזְקִיָּ֡הוּ <S%H2396><s%> and Hezekiah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַחְלְק֣וֹת <S%H4256><s%> the courses הַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <S%H3548><s%> of the priests וְ֠הַלְוִיִּם <S%H3881><s%> and the Levites עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> by מַחְלְקוֹתָ֞ם <S%H4256><s%> after their courses אִ֣ישׁ ׀ <S%H376><s%> every man כְּפִ֣י <S%H6310><s%> according עֲבֹדָת֗וֹ <S%H5656><s%> to his service לַכֹּהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> the priests וְלַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> and Levites לְעֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> for burnt offerings וְלִשְׁלָמִ֑ים <S%H8002><s%> and for peace offerings לְשָׁרֵת֙ <S%H8334><s%> to minister וּלְהֹד֣וֹת <S%H3034><s%> and to give thanks וּלְהַלֵּ֔ל <S%H1984><s%> and to praise בְּשַׁעֲרֵ֖י <S%H8179><s%> in the gates מַחֲנ֥וֹת <S%H4264><s%> of the tents יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> God ס

וּמְנָת֩ <S%H4521><s%> portion הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> [He appointed] also the king's מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at רְכוּשׁ֜וֹ <S%H7399><s%> of his substance לָעֹל֗וֹת <S%H5930><s%> for the burnt offerings לְעֹלוֹת֙ <S%H5930><s%> burnt offerings הַבֹּ֣קֶר <S%H1242><s%> [to wit] for the morning וְהָעֶ֔רֶב <S%H6153><s%> and evening וְהָ֣עֹל֔וֹת <S%H5930><s%> and the burnt offerings לַשַּׁבָּת֖וֹת <S%H7676><s%> for the sabbaths וְלֶחֳדָשִׁ֣ים <S%H2320><s%> and for the new moons וְלַמֹּעֲדִ֑ים <S%H4150><s%> and for the set feasts כַּכָּת֖וּב <S%H3789><s%> as [it is] written בְּתוֹרַ֥ת <S%H8451><s%> in the law יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Moreover he commanded לָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> the people לְיוֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> that dwelt יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem לָתֵ֕ת <S%H5414><s%> to give מְנָ֥ת <S%H4521><s%> the portion הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> of the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֑ם <S%H3881><s%> and the Levites לְמַ֥עַן <S%H4616><s%> might יֶחֶזְק֖וּ <S%H2388><s%> that they might be encouraged בְּתוֹרַ֥ת <S%H8451><s%> in the law יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וְכִפְרֹ֣ץ <S%H6555><s%> came abroad הַדָּבָ֗ר <S%H1697><s%> And as soon as the commandment הִרְבּ֤וּ <S%H7235><s%> in abundance בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel רֵאשִׁ֣ית <S%H7225><s%> the firstfruits דָּגָ֗ן <S%H1715><s%> of corn תִּיר֤וֹשׁ <S%H8492><s%> wine וְיִצְהָר֙ <S%H3323><s%> and oil וּדְבַ֔שׁ <S%H1706><s%> and honey וְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all תְּבוּאַ֣ת <S%H8393><s%> and of all the increase שָׂדֶ֑ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field וּמַעְשַׂ֥ר <S%H4643><s%> and the tithe הַכֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> of all לָרֹ֖ב <S%H7230><s%> they in abundantly הֵבִֽיאוּ׃ <S%H935><s%> brought

וּבְנֵ֧י <S%H1121><s%> And [concerning] the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וִֽיהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> and Judah הַיּֽוֹשְׁבִים֮ <S%H3427><s%> that dwelt בְּעָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> in the cities יְהוּדָה֒ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also הֵ֗ם <S%H1992><s%> in מַעְשַׂ֤ר <S%H4643><s%> the tithe בָּקָר֙ <S%H1241><s%> of oxen וָצֹ֔אן <S%H6629><s%> and sheep וּמַעְשַׂ֣ר <S%H4643><s%> and the tithe קָֽדָשִׁ֔ים <S%H6944><s%> of holy things הַמְקֻדָּשִׁ֖ים <S%H6942><s%> which were consecrated לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> their God הֵבִ֕יאוּ <S%H935><s%> they also brought in וַֽיִּתְּנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> and laid עֲרֵמ֥וֹת <S%H6194><s%> heaps עֲרֵמֽוֹת׃ <S%H6194><s%> heaps ס

בַּחֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשְּׁלִשִׁ֔י <S%H7992><s%> In the third הֵחֵ֥לּוּ <S%H2490><s%> they began הָעֲרֵמ֖וֹת <S%H6194><s%> of the heaps לְיִסּ֑וֹד <S%H3245><s%> to lay the foundation וּבַחֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשְּׁבִיעִ֖י <S%H7637><s%> [them] in the seventh כִּלּֽוּ׃ <S%H3615><s%> and finished ס

וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> came יְחִזְקִיָּ֣הוּ <S%H2396><s%> Hezekiah וְהַשָּׂרִ֔ים <S%H8269><s%> and the princes וַיִּרְא֖וּ <S%H7200><s%> and saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֲרֵמ֑וֹת <S%H6194><s%> the heaps וַֽיְבָרֲכוּ֙ <S%H1288><s%> they blessed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> עַמּ֥וֹ <S%H5971><s%> and his people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel פ

וַיִּדְרֹ֣שׁ <S%H1875><s%> questioned יְחִזְקִיָּ֗הוּ <S%H2396><s%> Hezekiah עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning הַכֹּֽהֲנִ֛ים <S%H3548><s%> with the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֖ם <S%H3881><s%> and the Levites עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning הָעֲרֵמֽוֹת׃ <S%H6194><s%> concerning the heaps

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> answered אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> about עֲזַרְיָ֧הוּ <S%H5838><s%> And Azariah הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> priest הָרֹ֖אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> the chief לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house צָד֑וֹק <S%H6659><s%> of Zadok וַ֠יֹּאמֶר <S%H559><s%> him and said מֵהָחֵ֨ל <S%H2490><s%> Since [the people] began הַתְּרוּמָ֜ה <S%H8641><s%> the offerings לָבִ֣יא <S%H935><s%> to bring בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> into the house יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אָכ֨וֹל <S%H398><s%> to eat וְשָׂב֤וֹעַ <S%H7646><s%> we have had enough וְהוֹתֵר֙ <S%H3498><s%> and have left עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> with לָר֔וֹב <S%H7230><s%> plenty כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD בֵּרַ֣ךְ <S%H1288><s%> hath blessed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמּ֔וֹ <S%H5971><s%> his people וְהַנּוֹתָ֖ר <S%H3498><s%> and that which is left אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הֶהָמ֥וֹן <S%H1995><s%> [is] this great store הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> and this ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> commanded יְחִזְקִיָּ֗הוּ <S%H2396><s%> Hezekiah לְהָכִ֧ין <S%H3559><s%> to prepare לְשָׁכ֛וֹת <S%H3957><s%> chambers בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיָּכִֽינוּ׃ <S%H3559><s%> and they prepared

וַיָּבִ֨יאוּ <S%H935><s%> And brought in אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַתְּרוּמָ֧ה <S%H8641><s%> the offerings וְהַֽמַּעֲשֵׂ֛ר <S%H4643><s%> and the tithes וְהַקֳּדָשִׁ֖ים <S%H6944><s%> and the dedicated בֶּאֱמוּנָ֑ה <S%H530><s%> [things] faithfully וַעֲלֵיהֶ֤ם <S%H5921><s%> charge נָגִיד֙ <S%H5057><s%> [was] ruler [כֹּונַנְיָהוּ כ] (כָּֽנַנְיָ֣הוּ <S%H3562><s%> Conaniah ק) הַלֵּוִ֔י <S%H3881><s%> the Levite וְשִׁמְעִ֥י <S%H8096><s%> and Shimei אָחִ֖יהוּ <S%H251><s%> his brother מִשְׁנֶֽה׃ <S%H4932><s%> [was] the next

וִֽיחִיאֵ֡ל <S%H3171><s%> And Jehiel וַ֠עֲזַזְיָהוּ <S%H5812><s%> and Azaziah וְנַ֨חַת <S%H5184><s%> and Nahath וַעֲשָׂהאֵ֜ל <S%H6214><s%> and Asahel וִֽירִימ֤וֹת <S%H3406><s%> and Jerimoth וְיוֹזָבָד֙ <S%H3107><s%> and Jozabad וֶאֱלִיאֵ֣ל <S%H447><s%> and Eliel וְיִסְמַכְיָ֔הוּ <S%H3253><s%> and Ismachiah וּמַ֖חַת <S%H4287><s%> and Mahath וּבְנָיָ֑הוּ <S%H1141><s%> and Benaiah פְּקִידִ֗ים <S%H6496><s%> [were] overseers מִיַּ֤ד <S%H3027><s%> under the hand [כָּונַנְיָהוּ כ] (כָּֽנַנְיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H3562><s%> Conaniah ק) וְשִׁמְעִ֣י <S%H8096><s%> and Shimei אָחִ֔יו <S%H251><s%> his brother בְּמִפְקַד֙ <S%H4662><s%> at the commandment יְחִזְקִיָּ֣הוּ <S%H2396><s%> Hezekiah הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king וַעֲזַרְיָ֖הוּ <S%H5838><s%> and Azariah נְגִ֥יד <S%H5057><s%> the ruler בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God

וְקוֹרֵ֨א <S%H6981><s%> And Kore בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יִמְנָ֤ה <S%H3232><s%> of Imnah הַלֵּוִי֙ <S%H3881><s%> the Levite הַשּׁוֹעֵ֣ר <S%H7778><s%> the porter לַמִּזְרָ֔חָה <S%H4217><s%> toward the east עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> over נִדְב֣וֹת <S%H5071><s%> [was] over the freewill offerings הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of God לָתֵת֙ <S%H5414><s%> to distribute תְּרוּמַ֣ת <S%H8641><s%> the oblations יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְקָדְשֵׁ֖י <S%H6942><s%> appoint הַקֳּדָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H6944><s%> and the most

וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> Under יָד֡וֹ <S%H3027><s%> by עֵ֣דֶן <S%H5731><s%> And next him [were] Eden וּ֠מִנְיָמִן <S%H4509><s%> and Miniamin וְיֵשׁ֨וּעַ <S%H3442><s%> and Jeshua וּֽשְׁמַֽעְיָ֜הוּ <S%H8098><s%> and Shemaiah אֲמַרְיָ֧הוּ <S%H568><s%> Amariah וּשְׁכַנְיָ֛הוּ <S%H7935><s%> and Shecaniah בְּעָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> in the cities הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> of the priests בֶּאֱמוּנָ֑ה <S%H530><s%> in [their] set office לָתֵ֤ת <S%H5414><s%> to give לַאֲחֵיהֶם֙ <S%H251><s%> to their brethren בְּמַחְלְק֔וֹת <S%H4256><s%> courses כַּגָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> as well to the great כַּקָּטָֽן׃ <S%H6996><s%> as to the small

מִלְּבַ֞ד <S%H905><s%> to הִתְיַחְשָׂ֣ם <S%H3187><s%> Beside their genealogy לִזְכָרִ֗ים <S%H2145><s%> of males מִבֶּ֨ן <S%H1121><s%> old שָׁל֤וֹשׁ <S%H7969><s%> from three שָׁנִים֙ <S%H8141><s%> years וּלְמַ֔עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> and upward לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> who הַבָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> [even] unto every one that entereth לְבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> into the house יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לִדְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> portion י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> his daily בְּיוֹמ֑וֹ <S%H3117><s%> his daily לַעֲב֣וֹדָתָ֔ם <S%H5656><s%> for their service בְּמִשְׁמְרוֹתָ֖ם <S%H4931><s%> in their charges כְּמַחְלְקוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4256><s%> according to their courses
